title: Mom Changed Her Will & Asked Me Not To Tell My Siblings
description:
Today, we’re talking with a parent who wants to transition their discipline style away from spanking, a woman who’s keeping a secret about her mom’s will, and a man whose marriage is on the rocks as a result of how his traumatic brain injury has changed him.
  How can we effectively discipline our kids without spanking them?
 Mom changed her will & asked me not to tell my siblings… should I?
 We can’t seem to recover our marriage after my traumatic brain injury
 Lyrics of the Day: "There Is a Light That Never Goes Out" - The Smiths
